meanings.meaning: the poor man's side (of the river)

vlive.korean: [무이네 남쪽의 사막 같은 모래 언덕 풍광] 모래 언덕 같은 느낌? [Mui Ne's sand dunes] it feels like sand dunes. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [W메이트 6화]모시고 오면 효녀 소리 듣는 북한산 맛집
vlive.english: [Mui Ne's sand dunes] it feels like sand dunes.

vlive.korean: 남쪽은 벚꽃이 만개했다고? Cherry blossoms are in full bloom in the south? 듣기 View video WINNER : 생일축하해미노
vlive.english: Cherry blossoms are in full bloom in the south?

vlive.korean: 현재 위치에서 남쪽 방향으로 약 28km 거리에 있습니다. and it's located 28 kilometers south of your current location. 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 오랜만에승희다_!
vlive.english: and it's located 28 kilometers south of your current location.

vlive.korean: 남쪽으로 네 번. Then... Four times to the south. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : LABOUM - LABOUM TeleVision 라붐 '이제는 날개를 펴고 날아올라'
vlive.english: Then... Four times to the south.

vlive.korean: 나를 남겨서 남쪽나라로... Just because of me. 듣기 View video V Special : [REPLAY] 2016 대한민국 대중문화 예술상 시상식

examples.korean: The summit was approachable only from the south. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 정상은 남쪽에서만 접근이 가능했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The summit was approachable only from the south. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The army continued to score successes in the south. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 군대가 남쪽에서 계속 승리를 거두었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The army continued to score successes in the south. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Troops repelled an attempt to infiltrate the south of the island. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 군대가 그 섬의 남쪽으로 침투하려는 시도를 격퇴했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Troops repelled an attempt to infiltrate the south of the island. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a warm southerly breeze 듣기 Add to Wordbook 남쪽에서 불어오는 따스한 미풍 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a warm southerly breeze Add to Wordbook
